body_html: I had read this before posting the issue. But no, it did not work. Also the file third_party/gpus/crosstool/CROSSTOOL no longer exists. I tried both third_party/gpus/crosstool/CROSSTOOL_nvcc.tpl and third_party/gpus/crosstool/CROSSTOOL_clang.tpl, but none of them worked.

body: I had read this before posting the issue. But no, it did not work. Also the file `third_party/gpus/crosstool/CROSSTOOL` no longer exists. I tried both `third_party/gpus/crosstool/CROSSTOOL_nvcc.tpl` and `third_party/gpus/crosstool/CROSSTOOL_clang.tpl`, but none of them worked.
